body.name: 2K/3MP Light Bulb Security Camera, 5G& 2.4GHz WiFi Alexa E27 360° Light Socket Camera for Outdoor, Wireless WiFi Home IP Camera with Motion Tracking Alarm, Color Night Vision,Two-Way Talk.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 35 mins
features: 【Wireless & Easy Installation】Simply screw in security camera for light socket a normal E26/E27 (110V ~ 240V). NO ADDITIONAL POWER SUPPLY, real wireless light bulb camera for outdoor/indoor. New connection technology, open the phone app and follow the installation guide or the instructions in the app to complete the connection to the WiFi camera within 30 seconds.

【2K 3MP Super HD & Color Night Vision】This wireless WiFi light bulb camera provides 3MP ultra-high-definition images, which are 40% better than other 1080P pixel security camera images. With 4 floodlights and 4 IR lights, three modes of smart night vision, infrared night vision and full-color night vision can be switched freely at the same time, the lightbulb security camera allows you to see clearly colored images even in the dark.

【Motion Tracking& Real-time Alarm】The wireless WiFi bulb camera adopt high-sensitivity motion sensor to detect human moving objects, follow it to move，when you are not there, it will send you real-time alarm notification through APP immediately, let you know every potential danger in your home.

【360° Remote Access & Supports Alexa】The wireless surveillance camera supports 360° panorama viewing, 355° horizontal rotation, 90° vertical up and down rotation angle, 8x zoom, allowing you to easily remotely manually control or automatically cruise the camera's angle of view through the APP. See live view from camera. At the same time, it supports Alexa voice assistant control.

【2-Way Talk & 2 Ways Storage】Built-in speaker and microphone keep you in touch with your family or pets anytime, anywhere. Don't worry about missing any moment any more, make your home safer. Support SD card and cloud storage at the same time, 24/7 recording. (Note: Upgrading from maximum support of 128GB to 256GB TF card storage, not including SD card.). If you have any questions, please contact us, our after-sales team will serve you 24 hours a day.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.0 4.0 out of 5 stars 1,123 ratings 4.0 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 8X Zoom The security camera has 8X digital zoom function, allowing you to zoom in and see finer things clearly. Work with Alexa Connect your light bulb camera to Amazon Alexa and you can talk to your children or pets at any time to remind them to pay attention to safety. Customize 6 Privacy Zones You can customize and set 6 security and privacy areas for this light bulb camera, which can effectively protect the privacy of your home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The picture quality is great. There are some learning curves though. I use the cameras in my basement. So I had to make special sockets for them so they didn’t get shut off when someone turned the lights off. Also I’m still trying to figure out how to stop it from sending me a notification e every time it does a screen change. I actually don’t even know what a screen change is or why it does them. The timing seems random. You do have to buy a subscription for each camera if you want everything stored Remotely. The pricing is reasonable if you only have a couple cameras. But even if you don’t get one it will at least take a picture and save it at every “event”. You can also buy memory cards and store everything that way. I guess my only two problems are that it lights me up with a spotlight every time I move while I’m sleeping if I fall asleep in my basement living room at night. I haven’t figured how to turn that off. And they don’t provide instructions. Also the “screen change” notifications are annoying. I haven’t figured out how to disable those. I know this sounds like complaining but it’s really not. If I just took the time to figure out all the settings I’m sure I’d be great. They seem secure from hacking. Have a sleek design. And provide much better picture and zoom quality than my ring cameras that cost about 15x more. For the price you absolutely cannot go wrong. Set up is pretty easy too. I highly recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable for a PTZ camera
reviews.reviewText: I have used several different security cameras over the years, and am currently using 3 brands. Out of the box, this camera has a solid, well-constructed build that should last long. Setting up the camera was about average with no particular obstacles. I must say the picture quality is outstanding! The colors are vivid, and the picture is sharp, even when zoom-in. The pan/tilt feature works well, allowing a very wide field of vision. The rotation speed is fast, smooth, and efficient. The night vision is at the top level of all the cameras I've used so far. In pitch darkness, I can see clearly for at least 100 ft. So far it works well through the Tuya app, the same app I'm using to control another camera in the front of my house. The true test will be longevity, and staying online.I use a waterproof exterior electrical box to house the camera’s connections and to route the electrical connection and ethernet cable to the interior of my house via a hole I drilled through the wall. The installation kit does provide a waterproof connection for the ethernet attachment cable.Note if you're going crazy with security... If you have more than 7 cams in one property or so I recommend putting cam 8, 9, 10, etc. on ethernet. You can get network congestion with too many on wifi, this happens with all security cameras, not just this one.What I like:1. Small and solid built2. Better lens, wider viewing with 8x zoom (wide-angle lenses), and 360-degree view with pan/tilt.3. 3 megapixels ( Super HD 2304x1296 )4. Easy installation bracket and easy access to the SD card5. Dual antenna for better-extended range connection and antenna mount are relocated in a better location and well covered6. 8 IR LED lights for better crystal viewing at night7. Easy access to the SD Card8. The 2-way audio9. Human body filteringCONs:Not a dual-band camera, still connecting to 2.4ghzI love this camera and recommend this camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great value for price. Has held up in outdoor extremes
reviews.reviewText: First let me say the pairing process to my network was super easy. NOTE: pair the cameras inside before placing them outdoor. So I waited for 3months before giving a review. If your like me, my main question was...how do the hold up in extreme conditions. I have 4 cameras (at each corner of home exterior) all are exposed to the elements. I live in Colorado so that should give you some clue. I've had high winds, blowing snow, Temps below zero. AND THEY ALL performed well. I do have one note of exception. The tracking seems to get a bit off in extreme cold. At times I found at least one camera loosing it's home position and rotating off view. In that case I switched from trucking to fixed mode. OH! the SD Card feature work very well. All data accessible and can be download from the camera to your local storage on phone via the app. Cametas support loop recording so once SD is full, it will override and start all over. So paying for cloud not necessary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Well, I guess I've had this device long enough now that I can tell you it's well worth the modest price they ask for it. It does everything the label claims. It detects motion and recognizes human forms, and it provides bright, sharply focused, and vivid images, both day and night. It needs to be paired with the necessary phone app and your wi-fi, and after that you have full control of the device's audio speaker, attitude, built-in LED lights, and microphone from wherever you are. I have only one issue with the product, however: I don't seem to be able to pair it with more than one iPhone at a time. If it will do so, I haven't been able to figure out how. At any rate, I'm giving the product 5 stars for excellent value and consumer serviceability.
